name: Treat (tamisujo)
description:
Tutorial:

1. Pick up empty jar, mallet and green bug  in the kitchen

2. Turn off light in tea room

3. Go up the stairs and into the studio, talk to the Taxidermist and ask about thread.

Then pick up empty thread cone in the shelves.

4. Pick up firefly lamp

5. Combine mallet and green bug, then green paste and lamp.

6. Use green lamp with spider in stairs room, use empty jar on spider, then pick up green thread.

7. Combine green thread with empty thread cone.

8. Give green thread in cone to the Taxidermist.

9. Open kitchen shelf with key.
